title: 342: CHATTY BROS: Grayston Vents about Crushes + Clayton’s Premiere Episode!
itunes:title: 342: CHATTY BROS: Grayston Vents about Crushes + Clayton’s Premiere Episode!
description:
It’s the first official WEEKLY Bros episode and they are starting out with a bang - Grayston confronting Evan, talking therapy, venting about the Broad’s crushes, processing opening relationships, and getting hit on! Then they dive into Clayton’s first episode - their front runners, MVPs, feelings about the new host, and more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***GIRLFRIEND COLLECTIVE: Get $25 off your purchase of $100 or more when you go to GIRLFRIEND.COM/CHATTY

***STAMPS.COM: Go to STAMPS.COM and use code CHATTY to get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
